resources.string: This app is provided as-is and we will not be responsible for any damage to your phone.\nBy clicking agree, you (the user), will conform to the following requirements made by the us (the developers). By entering your username and password in the fields, the user is giving us permission in parsing their information for displaying in the app. The app is secure; however, the user assumes full responsibility regarding his information usage and potential damages(extremely unlikely).

Clicking "Agree" constitutes your agreement to the following conditions:
 
 This app will:
 •send and receive data through Wi-Fi and your service provider.
 •communicate on your behalf with the server at mypisd.net on an SSL-encrypted connection.
 •locally store your username and password on your mobile device (if you choose to "Remember my password").
 
 This app will not:
 •store personal information, including but not limited to your name, student ID, or academic records, locally or on any remote server (except as mentioned above).
 
 You (the user) will not:
 •use this app to access a myPISD account that is not yours.
 
 We (the developers) will not be responible for responsible for:
 •damage incurred on your mobile device.
 •presentation of inaccurate information, including but not limited to name, student ID, or academic records.
